definition: to merge/to integrate/to become as one/to unify together
dozen (loanword)
to beat/to strike/to hit/to break/to type/to mix up/to build/to fight/to fetch/to make/to tie up/to issue/to shoot/to calculate/to play (a game)/since/from
surname Cheng
to succeed/to finish/to complete/to accomplish/to become/to turn into/to be all right/OK!/one tenth
one/1/single/a (article)/as soon as/entire/whole/all/throughout/"one" radical in Chinese characters (Kangxi radical 1)/also pr. [yao1] for greater clarity when spelling out numbers digit by digit
disk/sheet

thin piece/flake/a slice/film/TV play/to slice/to carve thin/partial/incomplete/one-sided/classifier for slices, tablets, tract of land, area of water/classifier for CDs, movies, DVDs etc/used with numeral 一[yi1]: classifier for scenario, scene, feeling, atmosphere, sound etc/Kangxi radical 91

sentences.english: Tap into your network of friends and acquaintances.
sentences.chinese: 和你的朋友以及熟人打成一片。

sentences.english: Do not be picky in the social intercourse . Try to make friends with all kinds of people.
sentences.chinese: 交際不要挑肥揀瘦，應該和各種各樣的人打成一片。

sentences.english: Try to make friends with all kindsof people.
sentences.chinese: 交際不要挑肥揀瘦，應該和各種各樣的人打成一片。

sentences.english: Don't pick and communicate, you should talk and play with all.
sentences.chinese: 交際不要挑肥揀瘦，應該和各種各樣的人打成一片。

sentences.english: The fifth principle is to engage with local communities and communicate your values.
sentences.chinese: 第五項原則是與當地社區打成一片，傳播你的價值觀。

sentences.english: He is a kindly teacher, mucking in with his students.
sentences.chinese: 他是一位和藹可親的教師，能與學生們打成一片。

sentences.english: Mr Wen has always delighted in an officially fostered man-of-the-people image.
sentences.chinese: 溫家寶一直喜歡塑造和人民打成一片的形象。

sentences.english: I liked Fromm and identified with him.
sentences.chinese: 我喜歡弗羅姆，和他打成一片。

sentences.english: A cadre must become one with the masses.
sentences.chinese: 幹部必須和羣衆打成一片。

sentences.english: Intellectuals should identify with the workers, peasants and soldiers.
sentences.chinese: 知識分子應該和工農兵打成一片。

definition: to get familiar with
familiar/close
amiable/easy-going
to talk cheerfully and wittily/to joke together
to be in contact (with sb)/to associate/to interact/to get along (well, poorly)
harmonious/friendly relations/on good terms with one another
amiable and approachable (idiom); easy-going/modest and unassuming/(of writing) plain and simple/easy to understand
to make friends/(dialect) to start an affair with sb
to come into contact with/to have dealings
to worm one's way into being friends with sb (usually derogatory)
to be able to talk to/to get along with/to be congenial
privately/secretly/confidentially
talking and laughing/to jest/cheerful and lively
to be well acquainted with/to know well
to carry on intimately with (idiom); ardent relationship (esp. between lovers)/billing and cooing
intimate/friendly/warm/active/lively (interaction, participation etc)
